backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features in AboutSection.tsx: updated brand story paragraphs and replaced stat highlights with three new feature highlight cards.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of all frontend source files to short descriptions, serving as a reference summary of each component's role in the AuraFlora app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme tokens including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the AuraFlora React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the full page layout in CartProvider and composes all sections (Navbar, Hero, About, Products, Gallery, Contact, Footer, CartDrawer).
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component with an asymmetric editorial layout, updated brand story paragraphs, and three feature highlight cards (Hand-Sculpted Florals, Artisanal Craftsmanship, Bespoke Creations).
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-out cart drawer showing cart items with quantity controls and subtotal, with a transition to the CheckoutForm component when the user proceeds to checkout.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutForm.tsx: Checkout form that collects customer name, email, and delivery address, then constructs and opens a pre-filled mailto URI to hello.auraflora@gmail.com with itemized order details.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders a contact section with a form that opens a mailto link on submission, plus displayed contact details (email, studio location, response time, Instagram).
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand logo, smooth-scroll navigation links, Instagram social link, contact details, and a copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a masonry-style 3-column image grid of four botanical gallery images with hover zoom and gradient overlay effects.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background image, decorative blobs, headline, tagline, two CTA scroll buttons, and an animated scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, a cart icon with item count badge, an enquiry CTA button, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product card with image, name, description, price, and an add-to-cart button that shows a brief confirmation state after clicking.
Defines a static array of 6 botanical products and renders them in a responsive grid using ProductCard components, with a styled section header.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides a React context for shopping cart state, supporting add/remove/update/clear operations with localStorage persistence and cart open/close UI state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, recreating it when the Internet Identity changes and invalidating dependent queries accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login/logout state, persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and defining Tailwind base styles, OKLCH CSS custom properties for the AuraFlora brand palette, and reusable component classes like contact/checkout inputs and navbar frosted glass.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with AuraFlora brand colors (OKLCH), custom fonts (Cormorant Garamond, Jost), border radii, box shadows, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the AuraFlora project state including existing features, architectural notes, known issues, and a pending request to update About Us page copy with new brand story paragraphs and feature highlights.
